folder: Richmond Road & Jefferson Avenue, Staten Island, NY
text:
(1)
Richmond Road (foreground), north from Jefferson Ave., showing the race track on the Richmond County Fair Grounds. Also shown is a general view in a northeasterly direction as seen from Dongan Hill,
near Flagg Place.
April 22, 1932.
P. L. Sperr.
(2)
A view across Richmond Road and the race track in a southeasterly
direction from near Dongan Hills Ave.
April 22, 1932.
P. L. Sperr.
